column4: Tesla curbs autopilot feature  but Musk says better than human driver
column5: DETROIT Tesla Motors said on Sunday it was updating the Autopilot driving systems in Model S sedans to put new limits on its hands-free operation  which has been both praised for its innovation while criticized for having been launched too early.
